segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely focused on her task, she's so diligent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is making a huge mess, someone should really turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking cookies, and the woman has no idea, she's so unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, and it looks like it's about to tip over, that's not safe at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, that would be awful, I can't bear to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely trusting her brother, she's so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water yet, she's going to slip and fall, someone should really tell her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside, it's a lovely contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it's too late, someone should really warn her, she's so unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, he must really want one, he's so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone needs to clean up the water before it causes a bigger problem, it's getting everywhere, it's so messy.
segments.speaker: PAR
